data.lyric:
[ti:Different World]
[ar:Alan Walker/K-391/Sofia Carson/CORSAK]
[al:Different World]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]Different World - Alan Walker/K-391/Sofia Carson/CORSAK
[00:00.02]Lyrics by：Shy Martin/Magnus Bertelsen/Fredrik Borch Olsen/Gunnar Greve
[00:00.03]Composed by：Alan Walker/Kenneth Nilsen/Mengzhou Hu/Shy Martin/Magnus Bertelsen/Fredrik Borch Olsen/James Daniel Njie Eriksen/Marcus Arnbekk/Gunnar Greve
[00:00.04]Produced by：Alan Walker/K-391/Big Fred/James Njie/CORSAK
[00:00.05]Published by：MER Publishing/Sony/ATV Music Publishing/Stellar Songs Ltd./BLNK Music Publishing/Copyright Control/Obel AS/Kassner Associated Publishers Ltd.
[00:00.06]Vocals by：Sofia Carson
[00:00.07]Background Vocals by：Shy Martin/Jesper Borgen
[00:00.08]Mixed by：Sören Von Malmborg At Basecamp Studios in Stockholm, Sweden
[00:00.09]Mastered by：Sören Von Malmborg At Cosmos Mastering in Stockholm, Sweden
[00:00.10]Co-produced by：Marcus Arnbekk
[00:00.11]Executive Producer：Gunnar Greve
[00:00.12]Vocal production by：Dreamlab
[00:00.13]Recorded at：MER Studios in Oslo, Norway. Sofia Carson's
[00:00.14]Vocals Recorded at：Dreamlab Studios in Los Angeles, California, Norway
[00:00.16]Repertoire Owner：MER Recordings (Swedish Deal)
[00:00.17]
[00:15.11]All we know
[00:16.85]Left untold
[00:18.82]Beaten by a broken dream
[00:22.36]Nothing like
[00:24.20]What it used to be
[00:28.84]We've been chasing our demons down an empty road
[00:33.03]Been watching our castle turning into dust
[00:36.70]Escaping our shadows just to end up here once more
[00:42.58]And we both know
[00:44.67]This is not the world we had in mind
[00:50.03]But we got time
[00:52.07]We are stuck on answers we can't find
[00:57.42]But we got time
[00:59.75]And even though we might have lost tonight
[01:02.67]The skyline reminds us of a different time
[01:06.80]This is not the world we had in mind
[01:12.16]But we got time
[01:14.30]Broken smiles
[01:15.94]Tired eyes
[01:17.79]I can feel your longing heart
[01:21.46]Call my name
[01:23.38]Howling from afar
[01:27.85]We've been fighting our demons just to stay afloat
[01:32.02]Been building our castle just to watch it fall
[01:35.84]Been running forever just to end up here once more
[01:41.58]And now we know
[01:43.56]This is not the world we had in mind
[01:49.23]But we got time
[01:51.02]We are stuck on answers we can't find
[01:56.52]But we got time
[01:58.82]And even though we might have lost tonight
[02:01.72]The skyline reminds us of a different time
[02:05.79]This is not the world we had in mind
[02:11.27]But we got time
[02:16.89]Take me back
[02:19.64]Back to the mountain side
[02:23.35]Under the northern lights
[02:27.03]Chasing the stars
[02:31.64]Take me back
[02:34.39]Back to the mountain side
[02:38.09]When we were full of life
[02:41.79]Back to the start
[02:44.42]And we both know that
[02:46.51]This is not the world we had in mind
[02:51.88]But we got time
[02:53.77]We are stuck on answers we can't find
[02:59.40]But we got time
[03:01.66]And even though we might have lost tonight
[03:04.53]The skyline reminds us of a different time
[03:08.57]This is not the world we had in mind
[03:13.99]But we got time
data.trans:
[ti:Different World]
[ar:Alan Walker/K-391/Sofia Carson/CORSAK]
[al:Different World]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.02]//
[00:00.03]//
[00:00.04]//
[00:00.05]//
[00:00.06]//
[00:00.07]//
[00:00.08]//
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.10]//
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.16]//
[00:15.11]我们彼此都清楚
[00:16.85]那未开口言说的真相
[00:18.82]破灭的梦啊已让我们溃不成军
[00:22.36]我们之间
[00:24.20]不复从前
[00:28.84]空旷的街道我们依然追逐着心底的恶魔
[00:33.03]眼睁睁的看着属于我们的城堡沦为灰烬
[00:36.70]逃离那阴霾 只是不想再重蹈覆辙
[00:42.58]我们彼此都明白
[00:44.67]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[00:50.03]但我们还有时间
[00:52.07]我们仍执着于觅寻那不曾出现的答案
[00:57.42]但我们还有时间
[00:59.75]即便今夜我们稍稍迷失又何妨
[01:02.67]天际线会提示我们迎接崭新的一天
[01:06.80]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[01:12.16]但我们还有时间
[01:14.30]一丝苦涩的笑
[01:15.94]疲惫的眼神
[01:17.79]我能感觉到你那蠢蠢欲动的心啊
[01:21.46]就呼唤我名吧
[01:23.38]远方传来一丝哀嚎
[01:27.85]我们仍与那恶魔纠缠不休 只为不愿就此沦陷
[01:32.02]一砖一瓦堆砌的城堡只得眼睁睁看着它坍塌陷落
[01:35.84]我们的脚步始终不停歇 只为悲剧不再重演
[01:41.58]此刻我们终于明白
[01:43.56]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[01:49.23]但我们还有时间
[01:51.02]我们仍执着于觅寻那不曾出现的答案
[01:56.52]但我们还有时间
[01:58.82]即便今夜我们稍稍迷失又何妨
[02:01.72]天际线会提示我们迎接崭新的一天
[02:05.79]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[02:11.27]但我们还有时间
[02:16.89]就让我重回过往
[02:19.64]回到那崇山之巅
[02:23.35]就在那北极光下
[02:27.03]追逐熠熠星光
[02:31.64]就让我重回过往
[02:34.39]回到那崇山之巅
[02:38.09]而我们精神焕发
[02:41.79]重回最初的原点
[02:44.42]我们彼此都明白
[02:46.51]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[02:51.88]但我们还有时间
[02:53.77]我们仍执着于觅寻那不曾出现的答案
[02:59.40]但我们还有时间
[03:01.66]即便今夜我们稍稍迷失又何妨
[03:04.53]天际线会提示我们迎接崭新的一天
[03:08.57]这并非是我们心驰神往的梦想天国啊
[03:13.99]但我们还有时间
